column6: members of border guard force No. 815 patrolling in Kbal Spean village
column7: Malai commune discovered that workers a total of 114 people
column8: including 48 women and 9 children trying to illegally cross the border into Thailand.------ ------According to a report by the border demarcation police force 815
column9: Cambodian workers who cross the border to work in Thailand are from 11 provinces.------Heng Polumam confirmed that all Cambodian and male workers had been instructed to return to their respective homelands.
